title: Artist Name and Tagline in the website header
content:
I need to know what the two different fonts are, that are used in the header on the website I'm developing:

Jimmy Clanton  
Still Solid Gold

Link: [http://www.josephruscitti.com/clients/jimmyclanton/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417083822/http:/www.josephruscitti.com/clients/jimmyclanton/ "http://www.josephruscitti.com/clients/jimmyclanton/")

Font: 

 Adobe Garamond and Apple Chancery 

Solved By: 

 [Renko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417083822/http:/typophile.com/user/12000 "View user profile.")
